name: Fracture (itch) (charliemoyes)
description:
Play as a nomadic adventurer searching for treasure, discover a power that destroyed the land, and put a stop to whatever was behind it!

With sword-fighting combat and platforming, you will traverse through different types of challenges that test your skill and awareness of your surroundings.

Created in Unreal Engine 4 for my Final Major Project at the University of Northampton as a prototype to demonstrate technical and level design skills.
